definition: to cut out (as a dress)/to cut/to trim/to reduce/to diminish/to cut back (e.g. on staff)/decision/judgment

sentences.english: We were kept on tenterhooks for hours while the judges chose the winner.
sentences.chinese: 我們坐立不安了好幾個小時，等着裁判們決定獲勝者。

sentences.english: At what point does the RO decide to abandon in deteriorating weather conditions?
sentences.chinese: 天氣惡化時，裁判長在什麼時刻決定放棄競賽？

sentences.english: The referee didn't blow his whistle at all and Nani actually looked at him to check.
sentences.chinese: 裁判沒有吹哨，納尼看着裁判想確認狀況。

sentences.english: The referee didn't blow his whistle at all and Nani actually looked at him to check.
sentences.chinese: 裁判沒有吹哨，納尼看着裁判想確認狀況。

sentences.english: Jefferson wrote, was the declaration of independence was "the referee" alliance.
sentences.chinese: 傑斐遜曾寫道，《獨立宣言》是“籲請世界的裁判”。

sentences.english: Tabb is the first woman to referee a world snooker championship final.
sentences.chinese: 塔普是第一位在斯諾克世錦賽決賽中擔當裁判的女性。

sentences.english: The home plate umpire calls balls and strikes and runs the game.
sentences.chinese: 司球裁判負責判斷壞球與擊球和推進比賽的進行。

sentences.english: Finally, the ref physically threw him out of the building.
sentences.chinese: 最後，裁判把他擡出了體育館。

sentences.english: History will be the final judge.
Among those whose conversations were monitored is Massimo De Santis, the ref Italy is sending to the World Cup this summer .
sentences.chinese: 其中包括德桑蒂斯，今年意大利選派到世界盃的裁判。

sentences.english: Ms Harman fully accepts the court’s judgment, " a spokesperson said.
sentences.chinese: “哈曼女士完全接受法庭的裁判”發言人聲稱。

sentences.english: Special thanks for the Referees provide match result.
sentences.chinese: 特別鳴謝裁判組提供賽果。

sentences.english: He refereed a basketball game yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 他昨天爲一場籃球賽作裁判。

sentences.english: An official throws the ball in the air as a player from each opposing team jumps to gain possession of the ball.
sentences.chinese: 裁判將球拋向空中，這時雙方的選手通過跳躍來爭球。

sentences.english: Arsène Wenger is backing the Football Association's call for greater respect to referees.
sentences.chinese: 溫格支持足總關於尊重裁判的呼籲。

sentences.english: The pre-definition fact refers to the fact affirmed by the effective judgment made by the court.
sentences.chinese: 預決事實是指爲法院生效裁判所確認的事實。

definition: to misjudge/error of judgment/incorrect ruling/miscarriage of justice
to break the rules/an illegality/a foul
to scout for a tour operator/to reconnoiter a potential tour itinerary/(tennis) to commit a foot fault
to cross a border/to go out of bounds (sport)
to walk/to step/pace/traveling (walking with the ball, a foul in basketball)
